titles: Here after foloweth the boke of Phyllyp Sparowe compyled by mayster Skelton Poete Laureate
author: Skelton, John, 1460?-1529.
publisher: At the poultry by [R. Copland for] Rychard Kele,
notes: Publisher's name and address from colophon; actual printer's name and conjectured publication date from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
